note.p: Physician and surgeon. MRCS, LSA, 1839. Practised in Falmouth, Cornwall, where he was Admiralty surgeon and agent. Surgeon on the P&O ship Ganges, 1861–76. Medical practitioner, South Brent, Devon, 1877–80; Plymouth, 1881.

BMD (Death index), Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1911/373/1), Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/2198/40/23), Medical directory.
